Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Entered atmosphere East to west glowing like an orange cigar.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There were 2 other sightings in Santa Cruz on or around July 5th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in the hot tub, saw the object hit the atmosphere glowing brightly. It traveled from east to west. Stopped north about light house field. It hovered at a high altitude and stayed stationary. Three engines were clearly viewable. Planes started to come in from the west and the object exited the atmosphere in a straight vertical lift till the engines were no longer visible. The object was in the sky for approximately 5 minutes. No sound was heard and no alcohol was involved. I cannot believe that there weren't other people who saw it as well.
